props.name: alt
props.description: 头像替换文本，仅当图片加载失败时有效

props.name: content
props.description: 子元素内容。TS 类型：`string | TNode`。[通用类型定义](https://github.com/Tencent/tdesign-vue-next/blob/develop/packages/components/common.ts)

props.name: default
props.description: 子元素内容，同 content。TS 类型：`string | TNode`。[通用类型定义](https://github.com/Tencent/tdesign-vue-next/blob/develop/packages/components/common.ts)

props.name: icon
props.description: 图标。TS 类型：`TNode`。[通用类型定义](https://github.com/Tencent/tdesign-vue-next/blob/develop/packages/components/common.ts)

props.name: imageProps
props.description: 透传至 Image 组件。TS 类型：`ImageProps`，[Image API Documents](./image?tab=api)。[详细类型定义](https://github.com/Tencent/tdesign-vue-next/blob/develop/packages/components/avatar/type.ts)

props.name: shape
props.description: 形状。可选项：circle/round。TS 类型：`ShapeEnum ` `type ShapeEnum = 'circle' | 'round'`。[详细类型定义](https://github.com/Tencent/tdesign-vue-next/blob/develop/packages/components/avatar/type.ts)

props.name: size
props.description: 尺寸，示例值：small/medium/large/24px/38px 等。优先级高于 AvatarGroup.size 。Avatar 单独存在时，默认值为 medium。如果父组件存在 AvatarGroup，默认值便由 AvatarGroup.size 决定

props.name: onError
props.description:
TS 类型：`(context: { e: Event }) => void`
图片加载失败时触发
